DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Evaluate Vadadustat Maintenance Treatment Anemia Subjects With Dialysis-dependent Chronic Kidney Disease ( DD-CKD )
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , open-label , active-controlled Phase 3 study efficacy safety vadadustat versus darbepoetin alfa maintenance treatment anemia subject DD-CKD
